name: enk
description: Personal memory assistant that tracks computer activity, stores context in Nia, and answers questions about your history

scripts.build: tsc && rm -rf dist/ui && cp -r src/ui dist/ui
scripts.start: tsc && rm -rf dist/ui && cp -r src/ui dist/ui && electron .
scripts.dev: tsc && rm -rf dist/ui && cp -r src/ui dist/ui && electron . --dev
